## Interactive maps

This is is a test of using leaflet with different map tiles (OSM,Stamen,CartoDB).
If this works, things might get very fun. 



```{r testingTiles, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
m <- leaflet() %>% setView(lat=51.522, lng=-0.136,  zoom = 15)
m <- addMarkers(m, lat=51.522, lng=-0.136,  popup="CASA! Woohoo!")
m %>% addTiles()

```

```{r Stamen, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
m %>% addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.Toner)
```

```{r CartoDb, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
m %>% addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron)
```
